description:
This guy is amazing. Ray Anthony is a lean, shredded, cock-tugging machine. We're joining him in his private mini-gym, where Ray knows just how to use the space for the most benefit.

He's starting out by getting his muscles loose. A little stretching goes a long way, especially when you're working out as intensely as Ray. He does some barbell work before getting down to the real business. You see, Ray has found that the greatest training he can do involves working up a massive erection and then jacking it until it explodes. It takes work, but Ray ain't no do-nothing kinda guy.

Work with Ray as he checks himself out in the full-body mirror, making sure his form is tight. Follow his movements as he pumps his abdomen up and down, back and forth. While the rhythm of the movements might be tricky to find, Ray knows it's what's in the athlete's heart that counts. So bring everything to the table and take nothing home. You and Ray are gonna jerk your cocks together until the job is done. It's this kind of support that makes such intense, dedicated training possible.

Enjoy!
title: Ray Anthony
